title: [Skin Ideas] PROJECT: "Villains" and Leader
body:
So in this PROJECT: sub-universe that Riot has created, there are heroes who follow Ashe and rebel to regain their humanity, and there are villains who fight them. So far the only "villains" are Zed and Katarina. That's 2 out of 9... We need more.

All PROJECT skins are at least 975 RP, with 2 being legendary (more than any other theme), and both of those are for the heroes. How about in the next batch of PROJECT skins we get more baddies and the 1820 skin be for one of them? Maybe, it could be their leader?

Here's my suggested Champions for the legendary PROJECT villain skin:

* Syndra
* Mordekaiser
* Swain
* Lissandra*
* Viktor**

*Maybe not since she already has Program Lissandra
**Perhaps too obvious, and he's already tied to the Battlecast skins

They're all leaders or main rivals of leaders in their own lore, and I personally think that these guys could do with a little legendary love.  Can you imagine PROJECT: Mordekaiser sending a holographic dragon at you? (yes, I know he's really weak right now but it'd still be cool) Or PROJECT: Swain transforming into a cyborg-were-vulture?

My other candidates for possible (non-leader) PROJECT villains include; Darius, Morgana, Renekton, Malzahar, Nautilus, Diana, Maokai, and Draaaaaaven.

What does everyone think? Can we get Riot to do this for us?

replies.body:
PROJECT NASUS

lol jks that would be terrible
oo oo what about project SHACO AND BLITZY!!!!

I don't think it us a sub-universe, if I'm correct it is actually the canon future of the current lol universe. (could be wrong)

As for the bad guys, The Battlecast series of skins are the enemy PROJECT: is fighting. 
Zed and Katarina switched sides for more power, they weren't the original enemies of Ashe and the others.
Battlecast Vel'Koz can be seen behind Katarina in her splash art. And a skin resembling a possible Battlecast Olaf kills Master Yi, in his original life.

This makes Creator Viktor the probable enemy of the PROJECT: Rebel group.

Also magic does not fit the criteria for the theme of PROJECT: skins, so i think it is unlikely that there will ever be a mage with a PROJECT: Skin.
So unfortunately that cancels out all of the skins you mentioned except Darius Draven and Nautilus. 

Renekton doesn't fit the criteria either as he is not human, and being human seems to be another criteria for PROJECT:

Ya know, Maybe since Viktor is the enemy of Project, Maybe there is a project Jayce in development?
hehe totally not a Jayce Main

I could see a PROJECT: Diana happening. After all Leona joined/was conscripted into the PROJECT. I think the common aspect between the various PROJECT members is a significant martial focus. 
Also to counter the mage theory, why is Ekko on the PROJECT team?
